tooltip.AIR: Access the settings of/nthe breath display
tooltip.ARMOR: Access the settings of/nthe armor display
tooltip.CLOCK: Access the settings of/nthe ingame clock display
tooltip.COMPASS: Access the settings of/nthe compass display
tooltip.DETAILS: Access the settings for/nthe item details list
tooltip.ENTITY_INSPECT: Access the settings of/nthe entity inspection display
tooltip.EXPERIENCE: Access the settings of/nthe experience display
tooltip.FOOD: Access the settings of/nthe hunger display
tooltip.HEALTH: Access the settings of/nthe health display
tooltip.HEALTH_MOUNT: Access the settings of/nthe mount health display
tooltip.JUMP_BAR: Access the settings of/nthe mount jump bar display
tooltip.LEVEL: Access the settings of/nthe player level display
tooltip.MISC: Access miscellaneous settings/nThis contains settings for/nthe fps counter and/nthe system time display
tooltip.STATUS_EFFECTS: Access the settings for/nthe status effects
tooltip.WIDGET: Access the settings of/nthe player widget/nthis isn't applicable for/nthe simple HUD type
tooltip.clock_time_format: Set the time format to either/n24 hours or 12 hours (AM/PM)
tooltip.color_absorption: Set the color of the/nabsorption part of the/nhealth bar
tooltip.color_air: Set the color of the/nbreath bar
tooltip.color_experience: Set the color of the/nexperience bar
tooltip.color_food: Set the color of the/nstamina/food bar
tooltip.color_fps: Change the color of the/nFPS counter
tooltip.color_health: Set the color of the/nhealth bar
tooltip.color_hunger: Set the color of the/nfood bar when under the/ninfluence of hunger
tooltip.color_jump_bar: Set the color of the/njump bar
tooltip.color_poison: Set the color of the/nhealth bar when under the/ninfluence of poison
tooltip.color_system_time: Change the color of the/nSystem time display
tooltip.color_wither: Set the color of the/nhealth bar when under the/ninfluence of wither
tooltip.debug_number_size: With some GUI Scale settings,/nthe numbers for the HUD can/nrender bit weird, if this/nhappens, toggle this setting
tooltip.enable_clock_color: Set the color of the clock/nwidget to change with the/ntime of day
tooltip.enable_compass_color: Enable/Disable the red color/nfor the "N" symbol
tooltip.enable_compass_coordinates: Toggle the numerical coordinates/n of the compass
tooltip.enable_fps: Display current FPS ingame/nBy default in the top left
tooltip.enable_immersive_clock: Only show the clock widget/nwhen a clock is inside the/nplayer's inventory
tooltip.enable_immersive_compass: Display the compass widget/nonly when a compass is inside the/nplayer's inventory
tooltip.enable_system_time: Display the current system time/n(Your local time)/nBy default in the bottom left
tooltip.enable_system_time_background: Enable a background for the/nsystem time display
tooltip.force_render: Set this element to be rendered/nregardless if other mods disable it./n /n§cActivate this if another mod/n§cdisables this element
tooltip.general: Access the general settings/nof the RPG-HUD
tooltip.hud_type: Change the style of the HUD
tooltip.invert_compass: Change the left and right/nof the compass
tooltip.limit_jump_bar: Only show the jump bar/nwhen jumping with a horse
tooltip.mount_health_percentage: Display mount health/navalue as a percentage
tooltip.pickup_duration: Set the duration of the/nitem pickup widget
tooltip.prevent_element_render: Prevent this element from rendering./nOther mods can still render their/nelements that are hooked/nto this element./n /n§cActivate this if you want to only /n§crender the element of another mod.
tooltip.prevent_event: Prevent the render event of/nthis element./nThis might disable features of/nother mods./n /n§cActivate this if another mod renders/n§csomething you don't want/n§cand can't disable it otherwise/n§cWARNING: Might disable other things, too
tooltip.reduce_size: Reduce the size of the/nitem details by 50%%/n(This has no effect with/nthe modern style HUD)
tooltip.render_player_face: Enabled/Disable player face/ndisplay of the widget
tooltip.render_vanilla: Force the vanilla version of/nthis element to be rendered instead./n /n§cActivate this if you encounter a/n§cproblem with this element
tooltip.scale: Set the scaling of this element/n0.5 means the scaling is 50%%/n2.0 means the scaling is 200%%
tooltip.show_armor: Show/Hide the armor durability display/nfor equipped armor
tooltip.show_arrow_count: Show/Hide the arrow amount display/nwhen equipping a bow
tooltip.show_convert_notification: Show the notification in/nthe Main Menu when a old/nsettings files are found
tooltip.show_durability_bar: Show the durability bar of/nitems at the details element
tooltip.show_entity_armor: Show the armor value of/nthe entity you are looking at/n(should it have armor)
tooltip.show_hunger_preview: Show a preview of the/nstamina/hunger bar when/na food item is selected/nfrom the hotbar
tooltip.show_item_durability: Show/Hide the item durability display/nfor equipped items
tooltip.show_numbers_experience: Show/Hide the numeric/nvalue of the experience bar
tooltip.show_numbers_food: Show/Hide the numeric/nvalue of the stamina/hunger bar./nIf you use the modern style,/nthis will also affect the/nhealth value
tooltip.show_numbers_health: Show/Hide the numeric/nvalue of the health bar./nIf you use the modern style,/nthis will also affect the/nfood value
tooltip.show_update_notification: Show the notification in/nthe Main Menu when a new/nversion is available
tooltip.status_time: Show a timer for/nthe Status Effects'/nduration
tooltip.use_position: When activated this element uses the/ncustom X/Y Coordinates set in the/nsettings of this element/n(If the Hud-Type supports/ncustom coordinates for this element)
tooltip.x_pos: Set the custom X/ncoordinate of this element/nRange: 0-1000/nThe value reflects the percent of/nthe screen from the left side/n250 would render this element at/n25%% from the left side of the screen
tooltip.y_pos: Set the custom Y/ncoordinate of/nthis element/nRange: 0-1000/nThe value reflects the percent of/nthe screen from the top side/n250 would render this element at/n25%% from the top side of the screen
